activities: Brite Content operates an online marketing automation system that enterprises use to offer promotions to their prospective customers. Brite Content hosts web pages on behalf of our enterprise customers. Those web pages contain forms that are used to collect contact information (name, phone number and email address) from our enterprise customers' prospective customers. When a prospective customer of one of our enterprises submits the form data through the hosted web page, our system routes the contact information submitted by the prospect to our enterprise customer. The prospect's contact information is not shared with any other party, only with our enterprise customer to whom the prospect intended to share the information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The Personal Data processed by Brite Content that is covered by the Safe Harbor Framework includes the contact information for EU customers and EU users. There is no manually processed data.
recoursemech: Brite Content commits to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) and Switzerland (Swiss FDPIC) or their authorized representatives.
